content: That's really helpful! I think I'll start by pricing my limited edition candles at a premium, around $30-$35, to reflect the uniqueness of the seasonal ingredients and the limited availability. I also like the idea of offering a special edition gift set, maybe with a candle, a matching diffuser, and a summer-themed decorative item, like a sea glass vase or a shell-shaped coaster. What do you think about offering a discount for customers who pre-order the gift set?
